import MKBox from"components/MKBox";import MKTypography from"components/MKTypography";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ToggleContext(){const[checked,setChecked]=useState(false);const toggleSwitch=()=>setChecked(!checked);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKBox,{component:"section",py:8,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,item:true,xs:4,justifyContent:"center",mx:"auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MKBox,{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Switch,{checked:checked,onChange:toggleSwitch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MKBox,{ml:2,lineHeight:0.5,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKTypography,{display:"block",variant:"button",fontWeight:"bold",children:"Remember me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKTypography,{variant:"caption",color:"text",fontWeight:"regular",children:"Be sure that you will always be logged in."})]})]})})})});}export default ToggleContext;
